scenes.text: The Transgender, Ally, Non-binary, Gender questioning, and Gender non-conforming Society (TANGGS) is a non-alcoholic society seeking to build community among transgender and nonbinary Cardiff University students.
We usually meet weekly on Saturdays, but specific date and times for socials can be found on our SU page and our Instagram.

We aim to have weekly socials with a variety of activities. Previous socials have involved group charity shopping, picnicking, and coffee mornings, and we plan for more socials involving fundraisers, greenspace walks, and mediated discussions on hot topics relevant to being transgender. We also seek to host joint socials with accepting university societies.
